overview:
Before joining RedBeacon, Gercek worked at Six Apart as a User Experience Engineer. He launched projects for Coca Cola, Independent Film Channel, News Corp, Society of Publication, Sprint, Consumerist and KCET. He was responsible for working on the information architecture, graphics design & front-end development (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Movable Type and Django).

He co-founded social search engine Kimburda.com in 2010 and reached a million unique visitors each month. Recently launched FriendStream.TV as part of Startup Bus 2011.

“Ever get tired of keeping track of the video links your friends send you? Friendstream.tv scrapes your social network feeds for videos and pulls them into a channel you can watch on your internet-enabled TV, phone or laptop.” http://j.mp/friendstreamtv-on-wired
